name: Visual Novel
question_text_en: How do you feel about visual novels?

option4_en: I strongly dislike visual novels, as they often lack gameplay elements.
question_text_ro: Ce parere ai despre romanele vizuale?

option3_ro: Nu sunt prea interesat de romanele vizuale.
option4_ro: Imi displac puternic romanele vizuale, deoarece adesea lipsesc elementele de gameplay.

name: Ranking System
question_text_en: How do you feel about ranking systems in games?
option1_en: I enjoy ranking systems, they add a sense of progression and competition.
option2_en: I'm okay with them if they're fair and well-designed.
option3_en: I'm not particularly interested in ranking systems.
option4_en: I strongly dislike ranking systems, as they can lead to toxicity and elitism.
question_text_ro: Ce parere ai despre sistemele de clasament in jocuri?
option1_ro: Imi plac sistemele de clasament, adauga un sentiment de progres si competitie.
option2_ro: Sunt ok cu ele daca sunt echitabile si bine concepute.
option3_ro: Nu sunt prea interesat de sistemele de clasament.
option4_ro: Nu imi plac deloc sistemele de clasament, deoarece pot duce la toxicitate si elitism.

name: Never-Ending
question_text_en: What is your opinion on never-ending games?
option1_en: I love never-ending games, they offer infinite replayability and variety.
option2_en: I'm okay with them if they're engaging and constantly updated.
option3_en: I'm not particularly interested in never-ending games.
option4_en: I strongly dislike never-ending games, as they can feel aimless and repetitive.
question_text_ro: Ce parere ai despre jocurile care nu se termina niciodata?
option1_ro: Ador jocurile care nu se termina niciodata, ofera o rejucabilitate infinita si varietate.
option2_ro: Sunt ok cu ele daca sunt captivante si actualizate constant.
option3_ro: Nu sunt prea interesat de jocurile care nu se termina niciodata.
option4_ro: Nu imi plac deloc jocurile care nu se termina niciodata, deoarece pot parea lipsite de scop si repetitive.

name: Game Based on Literature
question_text_en: How do you feel about games based on literature?
option1_en: I enjoy games based on literature, they offer immersive adaptations of beloved stories.
option2_en: I'm okay with them if they're faithful to the source material while adding new elements.
option3_en: I'm not particularly interested in games based on literature.
option4_en: I strongly dislike games based on literature, as they can feel constrained by the original story.
question_text_ro: Cum te simti in legatura cu jocurile bazate pe literatura?
option1_ro: Ma bucur de jocurile bazate pe literatura, ele ofera adaptari imersive ale povestilor indragite.
option2_ro: Sunt de acord cu ele daca sunt fidele materialelor originale si adauga elemente noi.
option3_ro: Nu sunt prea interesat de jocurile bazate pe literatura.
option4_ro: Nu-mi plac deloc jocurile bazate pe literatura, deoarece pot simti constrangerile povestirii originale.
